price: Dhugumatti, isaaf Nu bira dhihaannaafi deebii gaarii ta’etu jira.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
